select.isEqual: select * from (select zh.jgdh, jg.jgmc, zh.zhdh, zh.zhhm, zh.zhye, zh.ffrq, f_get_dqfp($jsrq$, zh.jxdxdh, zh.gxhslx, zh.khdxdh, 'dk') as fpgx, zh.kmh, bz.bzzwmc, zh.qx from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh = jg.jgdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = zh.bz left join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.ffrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and zh.zhye > $zhye$ and zh.jgdh = '$jgdh$' and zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%') a order by a.ffrq desc
